methods.description: Gets a two-letter abbreviation for a state or province name data

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Your Interzoid license API key. Register at www.interzoid.com/register

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State (or province) name from which to retrieve the two letter abbreviation.

apiDescription: This API provides the two-letter state abbreviation (or the province abbreviation for Canada) for the purposes of standardizing state name data, improving query results, analytics, and data merging.
